mapper.select: select total,notest,negative,positive,test,ROUND((test/total) * 100,2) pc from (select count(kid) total, sum(case when result = 1 then 1 else 0 end) notest, sum(case when result = 2 then 1 else 0 end) negative, sum(case when result = 3 then 1 else 0 end) positive, sum(case when result != 1 then 1 else 0 end) test from bs_environment where flag = 1) lt
